name: Lyzard-KZ1 I
headline: Antique gold
description: Exceptional clarity and performance from an ultra-compact loudspeaker designed to disappear into refined spaces.
story: The Lyzard-KZ1 I ultra-mini point source loudspeaker is the smallest member of K-array’s Lyzard mid-high micro-loudspeaker range. Featuring a miniaturised ultra-resistant 2.2 x 3.7 1.1 cm milled aluminium enclosure housing a single 0.5” long-excursion neodymium magnet transducer for a total weight of just 21 g, the Lyzard-KZ1 ensures uncompromised audio performance with minimum residual noise, despite its discreet dimensions. The form and quality of the Lyzard series make it the perfect solution for environments that require high-performance audio where decor and aesthetics cannot be compromised.
definition: The Lyzard-KZ1 I ultra-mini point source loudspeaker is the smallest member of K-array’s Lyzard mid-high micro-loudspeaker range. Featuring a miniaturised ultra-resistant 2.2 x 3.7 1.1 cm milled aluminium enclosure housing a single 0.5” long-excursion neodymium magnet transducer for a total weight of just 21 g, the Lyzard-KZ1 ensures uncompromised audio performance with minimum residual noise, despite its discreet dimensions. The form and quality of the Lyzard series make it the perfect solution for environments that require high-performance audio where decor and aesthetics cannot be compromised.

lifestyle.caption: With a horizontal and vertical coverage of 140° and a frequency response from 500 Hz up to 18 kHz, KZ1 I provides clear audio reproduction and flawless intelligibility at a peak SPL of 86 dB, an impressive performance for a miniature loudspeaker.
To complete the full frequency range of your audio systems, Lyzard loudspeakers must be combined with one or more of the Truffle or Rumblesubwoofers and driven by one of our Kommanderamplifiers.

Lyzard loudspeakers are available in semi-matte black or white as standard, or any RAL colour, as well as several premium finishes, on request. Polished aluminium, 24K gold, rose gold or antique gold plating are among the most luxurious finishes.

The front of the loudspeaker cabinet is protected by a magnetic grille that can be removed with a small neodymium magnet knob, included in the package. This new feature makes the fixing point much faster to access, helping installers reduce set-up and maintenance times. The rear panel incorporates a small two-pole screw euro-block connector, so no specific connector is required, further streamlining the installation process.

name: K-array Lyzard-KZ1R I
headline: Recessed ultra-miniature line array
description: The Lyzard-KZ1R I adds a recessed mounting frame for invisible integration into walls, ceilings or millwork.
story: The Lyzard-KZ1R I ultra-mini point source loudspeaker is the smallest member of K-array’s Lyzard mid-high micro-loudspeaker range. Featuring a miniaturised ultra-resistant 2.8 x 4.3 1.1 cm milled aluminium enclosure housing a single 0.5” long-excursion neodymium magnet transducer for a total weight of just 21 g, the Lyzard-KZ1R ensures uncompromised audio performance with minimum residual noise, despite its discreet dimensions. The form and quality of the Lyzard series make it the perfect solution for environments that require high-performance audio where decor and aesthetics cannot be compromised.  Lyzard-KZ1R is with a metallic spring clip for recessed in-wall installation and fast and easy mounting.

name: K-array Lyzard-KZ14 I
headline: Extended micro column with higher output
description: The Lyzard-KZ14 I extends the Lyzard family with a taller column for greater output and throw from the same micro form factor.
story: The Lyzard-KZ14 I ultra-mini line array loudspeaker is the smallest member of K-array’s Lyzard mid-high loudspeaker range. Featuring an ultra-resistant 2.2 x 10 x 1.1 cm milled aluminium enclosure housing 4 x long-excursion neodymium magnet transducers for a total weight of just 59 g, the Lyzard-KZ14 I ensures uncompromised audio performance with minimum residual noise, despite its discreet dimensions. The form and quality of the Lyzard series make it the perfect solution for environments that require high-performance audio where decor and aesthetics cannot be compromised.
definition: The Lyzard-KZ14 I ultra-mini line array loudspeaker is the smallest member of K-array’s Lyzard mid-high loudspeaker range. Featuring an ultra-resistant 2.2 x 10 x 1.1 cm milled aluminium enclosure housing 4 x long-excursion neodymium magnet transducers for a total weight of just 59 g, the Lyzard-KZ14 I ensures uncompromised audio performance with minimum residual noise, despite its discreet dimensions. The form and quality of the Lyzard series make it the perfect solution for environments that require high-performance audio where decor and aesthetics cannot be compromised.

lifestyle.caption: With a vertical coverage of 40° and horizontal coverage of 140°, it is our smallest model to feature PAT array technology. With a frequency response from 500 Hz up to 18kHz, KZ14 I provides clear audio reproduction and flawless intelligibility at a peak SPL of 98 dB, an impressive performance for a miniature loudspeaker. To complete the full frequency range of your audio systems, Lyzard loudspeakers must be combined with one or more of the Truffle or Rumble subwoofers and driven by one of our Kommander amplifiers. Lyzard loudspeakers are available in semi-matte black or white as standard, or any RAL colour, as well as several premium finishes, on request. Polished aluminium, 24K gold, rose gold or antique gold plating are among the most luxurious finishes.

The front of the loudspeaker cabinet is protected by a magnetic grille that can be removed with a small neodymium magnet knob, included in the package. This new feature makes the fixing point much faster to access, helping installers reduce set-up and maintenance times. The rear panel incorporates a small two-pole screw euro-block connector, so no specific connector is required, further streamlining the installation process.

The Lyzard-KZ14 I is ideally suited for audio integrations in retail environments, small lounges and bars, home residences, hotels and museums, allowing venues to maintain their aesthetic whilst keeping listeners satisfied with high-quality sound.

name: K-array Kobra-KK52 I
headline: The Kobra-KK52 I is the half-meter model in the Kobra series. The passive speaker is comprised of eight closely-spaced 2" cone woofers housed in a durable stainless steel frame that effectively reproduces quality sound naturally. Its selectable impedance feature (16 Ω / 64 Ω) offers easier use and integration with other speakers or amplifiers. With such a compact frame, the Kobra-KK52 I is perfect for discreet installations in restaurants, houses of worship and events.
description: Kobra-KK52 I is a slim stainless-steel passive column with closely spaced drivers for controlled, elegant coverage.
story: The Kobra-KK52 I is the half-meter model in the Kobra series. The passive speaker is comprised of eight closely-spaced 2" cone woofers housed in a durable stainless steel frame that effectively reproduces quality sound naturally. Its selectable impedance feature (16 Ω / 64 Ω) offers easier use and integration with other speakers or amplifiers. With such a compact frame, the Kobra-KK52 I is perfect for discreet installations in restaurants, houses of worship and events.

drivers: Multiple small full-range drivers in a slim column

name: K-array Kobra-KK102 I
headline: One meter long, the Kobra-KK102 I is a passive loudspeaker comprised of sixteen 2" neodymium magnet woofers. With two different impedance values 8Ω / 32Ω, the Kobra-KK102 I allows the user to select between wide or narrow coverage. Featuring true line array characteristics, the Kobra-KK102 I is an excellent design element for retail, restaurants and hotels.
description: Kobra-KK102 I doubles the height of KK52 I for greater throw and consistency in tall or reverberant spaces.
story: One meter long, the Kobra-KK102 I is a passive loudspeaker comprised of sixteen 2" neodymium magnet woofers. Featuring true line array characteristics, the Kobra-KK102 I is an excellent design element for retail, restaurants and hotels.

name: K-array Vyper-KV25 II
headline: Compact flat-panel line-array column
description: Vyper-KV25 II is a slim aluminium column with a flat front grille, designed to disappear alongside architectural lines.
story: Where the wall detail is razor-sharp, KV25 II hugs stone, glass or timber and throws a controlled sound field down the room.
definition: The Vyper-KV25 II is an ultra-flat passive loudspeaker comprised of four 1” neodymium magnet transducers each, housed in an elegant yet sturdy aluminum chassis, with a new frameless chassis designed for very elegant discreet installations, perfect for a clean bracketless application on any flat surface. The four closely-spaced cone drivers provide true line array characteristics: phase coherence, low distortion and focused listening in both the near field and at a distance from the speaker.

name: K-array Vyper-KV25R II
headline: Curved-ready flat-panel column
description: The Vyper-KV25R II adds a mechanically flexible rear plate to follow gentle curves in faÃ§ades and interiors.
story: The Vyper-KV25R II is an ultra-flat passive loudspeaker comprised of four 1” neodymium magnet transducers each, housed in an elegant yet sturdy aluminum chassis, designed for in-wall recessed installations.The four closely-spaced cone drivers provide true line array characteristics: phase coherence, low distortion and focused listening in both the near field and at a distance from the speaker.
definition: The Vyper-KV25R II is an ultra-flat passive loudspeaker comprised of four 1” neodymium magnet transducers each, housed in an elegant yet sturdy aluminum chassis, designed for in-wall recessed installations.The four closely-spaced cone drivers provide true line array characteristics: phase coherence, low distortion and focused listening in both the near field and at a distance from the speaker.
drivers: Multiple full-range drivers in flexible chassis

name: K-array Vyper-KV25W I
headline: White flat-panel column for wall mounting
description: Vyper-KV25W I offers the compact KV25 column in a white finish for seamless blending into light interiors.
story: The Vyper-KV25W I is a 26-cm-long passive line array comprised of four 1” neodymium magnet transducers housed in an elegant and resistant aluminum chassis. The Vyper-KV25W I features two different values of impedance (8Ω – 32Ω), with the benefit of joining up to 8 units powered from a single amplifier channel at the 32Ω, being the perfect solution for small to medium venues. The Vyper is able to reproduce the whole vocal frequency range with high intelligibility and unparalleled directivity.
definition: The Vyper-KV25W I is a 26-cm-long passive line array comprised of four 1” neodymium magnet transducers housed in an elegant and resistant aluminum chassis. headline: Medium flat-panel line-array column
description: Vyper-KV52 II is a taller flat-panel column for more output and throw while preserving the razor-slim profile.
story: Ideal for hospitality and showrooms where you need punch and projection but refuse to compromise on the architecture.
definition: Vyper-KV52 II is an ultra-flat passive loudspeaker comprised of eight 1” neodymium magnet transducers each, housed in an elegant yet sturdy aluminum chassis, with a new frameless chassis designed for very elegant discreet installations, perfect for a clean bracketless application on any flat surface.

lifestyle.alt: Vyper-KV52 II installed alongside dÃ©cor panels

name: K-array Vyper-KV52F II
headline: Flush-mount flat-panel column
description: Vyper-KV52F II is a flush-mountable version of KV52 II for in-wall or in-panel integration.
story: For interiors where the speaker must sit flush with cladding or joinery, KV52F II frames the column into the surface.
definition: Vyper-KV52F II is an ultra-flat passive loudspeaker comprised of eight 1” neodymium magnet transducers each, characterized by a wide sound emission pattern both in the horizontal and vertical directions. The new frameless chassis of the Vyper-KV52F II suites now a clean bracketless installation on any flat surface. The eight closely-spaced cone drivers are fed with electronically processed signals that widen the sound emission of the loudspeaker. The Vyper-KV52F II and Vyper-KV52FR II are elegant wide-dispersion loudspeakers with a slim form factor tailoring the applications where wide coverage is required.
drivers: Array of full-range drivers behind flat grille

lifestyle.alt: Vyper-KV52F II flush in architectural panel

name: K-array Vyper-KV52FR II
headline: Flush-mount column for curved faÃ§ades
description: Vyper-KV52FR II adds flexible mounting to the flush KV52F format for subtle curves and complex surfaces.
story: FaÃ§ades and feature walls rarely stay flat; KV52FR II gives designers freedom to follow those lines with a continuous sound source.
definition: Vyper-KV52FR II is a ultra-flat passive loudspeakers comprised of eight 1” neodymium magnet transducers each, characterized by a wider sound emission pattern if compared to Vyper- KV52 II and Vyper- KV52R II. The eight closely-spaced cone drivers are fed with electronically processed signals that widen the overall sound emission of the loudspeaker.
drivers: Array of full-range drivers with flexible frame

headline: Flexible flat-panel column

name: K-array Dragon-KX12 I
headline: High-power point-source loudspeaker
description: Dragon-KX12 I is a versatile, high-output point-source loudspeaker for live and install applications.
story: Combining a compact footprint with tour-ready output, KX12 I is equally at home as a monitor, main or powerful fill.
definition: High-power point-source loudspeaker with flexible mounting.

name: K-array Dragon-KXT12P
headline: Companion 12" passive subwoofer
description: Dragon-KXT12P is a compact, high-performance passive 12" subwoofer voiced to pair with KX12 and related systems.
story: It provides the low-frequency foundation for Dragon rigs in smaller venues and portable applications.
definition: Compact 12" passive subwoofer for Dragon systems.

name: K-array Dragon-KXT18P
headline: High-output 18" passive subwoofer
description: Dragon-KXT18P is a powerful 18" passive sub designed to extend Dragon systems into full concert-duty low-end.
story: For venues that need chest-hitting low frequencies, KXT18P anchors the low end under Dragon arrays and stacks.
definition: High-output 18" passive subwoofer for Dragon and larger systems.

story: Born for large-scale productions, KH8 brings Firenzeâ€™s precision and Italian design language to stadium and arena sound.

name: K-array Firenze KS7
headline: Luxury passive architectural speaker
description: Firenze KS7 applies Firenze acoustic thinking to a passive loudspeaker for design-led architectural installs.
story: Ideal where you want Firenze performance but prefer external amplification and processing.
definition: Luxury passive installation loudspeaker within the Firenze line.
